mapper.select: SELECT c.category_id, c.category_name, c.description, c.is_active, COUNT(p.post_id) AS post_count FROM t_forum_category c LEFT JOIN t_forum_post p ON c.category_id = p.category_id AND p.post_status = 1 WHERE c.is_active = 1 GROUP BY c.category_id, c.category_name, c.description, c.is_active ORDER BY c.category_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_forum_category (category_name, description, is_active) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{description}, #{isActive})
